hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

locations.Bottom of the Well Front Left Fake Wall: Small Key Ring (Bottom of the Well)

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Green Rupee#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that a rock on #a ledge in the valley# hides #Dampé's Grave#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that ##Hyrule Field## has #1# major item.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)# and #a Red Rupee#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #flames in the royal tomb# reveal #a Blue Rupee#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that #Arrows (10 pieces)# can be found at #Hyrule Castle#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #the Biggoron Sword#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #Arrows (10 pieces)#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that #the Deku Tree# hoards #a Forest Temple Small Key Ring#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Recovery Heart# and #a Recovery Heart#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Green Rupee#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that a #storm near the castle# reveals #3 Deku Scrubs#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #the Biggoron Sword#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that #Dodongo's Cavern# is on the way of the hero.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that ##Dodongo's Cavern## has #7# major items.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #a Blue Rupee#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that plundering #Jabu Jabu's Belly# is a foolish choice.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that in the #river in the Water Temple# lies...^ #a Heart Container# and #a Recovery Heart#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that #the Fire Temple# is on the path to #Barinade#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that the #Water Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that #the Fire Temple# hoards #a Gold Skulltula Token#.
hinted_locations: Fire Temple Flame Maze Right Side Pot 3

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that #the Water Temple# hoards #a Red Rupee#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: Use Multiworld to cross the gaps between worlds and engage in jolly co-operation!

SFM (Saria).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #a Piece of Heart# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that the #Light Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that #the Forest Temple# hoards #the Bolero of Fire#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that plundering #Kakariko Village# is a foolish choice.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that those who seek #sunken silver rupees# will find #a Blue Rupee#.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground Underwater Silver Rupee Chest

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that Anju needs to stop losing her chickens.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that the #Fire Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that #wooden walls# in the Shadow Temple hide...^ #the Requiem of Spirit# and #a Deku Stick#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #Arrows (10 pieces)#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #a Blue Rupee#.
